title: Interface ACL Verification
objective: Verify the ACL function of the interface.

steps.description: Connect tester port A to DUT port 1, tester port B to DUT port 2. Send traffic from tester port A to the DUT, and observe the traffic reception at tester port B.
steps.expected_result: Tester port B should be able to observe the traffic.

steps.description: Configure ACL on DUT port 2 to deny all outbound traffic on this port.
steps.expected_result: Tester port B should observe no traffic.
